ModMetaData.name: Just Candles (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: stellar_kitty
ModMetaData.description:
Add candles to the game They can now be turned off and they're not destroyed when their fuel runs out. Candles have the focustype Flames, perfect for placing around in a circle!
Original Mod by APurpleApple (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1359492124) I changed some things as well, check the Changelog for details The code can be seen here: https://github.com/StellarKitty/Just-Candles
